snippet.title: Sentinels of the Multiverse: The Video Game
snippet.description:
Choose from 10 stalwart heroes, 4 nefarious villains, and 4 dynamic environments to play out your own comic book battles. Expansions add even more heroes, villains and environments to the mix!

Get Sentinels of the Multiverse: The Video Game is available now for iPad, Android Tablets and Windows/Mac/Linux via Steam!

Want to hear more about Handelabra or Sentinels of the Multiverse? We've got you covered. 
http://sentinelsdigital.com/
http://handelabra.com/forum
http://twitter.com/handelabra
http://facebook.com/handelabra

For more info on the card game created by Greater Than Games: 
http://sentinelsofthemultiverse.com
https://greaterthangames.com
